question: Who prophesied about the suffering servant who would bear the sins of many?
Isaiah prophesied about the suffering servant who would bear the sins of many. (True/False)
In which book is the teaching or vision where Isaiah prophesied about the suffering servant who would bear the sins of many primarily recorded?
Isaiah prophesied about the suffering servant who would bear the sins of many in the book of Genesis. (True/False)

Jeremiah spoke of a new covenant written on the heart. (True/False)

Jeremiah spoke of a new covenant written on the heart in the book of Genesis. (True/False)

Ezekiel saw a valley of dry bones that came to life in the book of Genesis. (True/False)

The correct answer to: 'In Romans, Paul says the gospel is the power of God for salvation to whom?' is 'To everyone who believes'. (True/False)
In Revelation, what is the New Jerusalem described as?
choices: A golden city coming down out of heaven
answer: A golden city coming down out of heaven
